main.name: Paul Miningwa
main.description: I am a blockchain developer with 2 years experince. I have been involved in projects in designing and implementing smart contracts based on Etherium Blockchain technology implemented on ReactJS and React Native.
main.bio: I have been involved in smart contracts implementations for three fortune 500 companies as a freelance developer. I have passion in software development and blockchain technologies ie Ethereum in particular. I am a seasoned blockchain developer with experience in web and mobile development. I am a problem solver and a team player with a history of delivering projects within the agreed timelines. I am a problem solver and a team player with a history of delivering projects within the agreed timelines. All this can be ascertained on my Upwork profile client testimonials.
main.contactmessage: I am looking forward to challenging and exciting opportunities that your projects may bring whether you are inSupply chain, Real Estate or Government. I shall be happy to partner with you in getting a solution to your problems. I shall handhold you through its implementation with an affordable one year Annual Maintenance Contract.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Masters in Information Technology - Data Analytics and Business Intelligence.
education.description: I am currently pursuing an M.Sc. IT DA & BI degree at Strathmore University Specializing in Predictive Analytics.
I studied Telecommunication and Information Technology during my undergraduate studies. I majored in Telecommunication Systems Security.

work.title: Freelance Blockchain Developer
work.description: I have developed projects on blockchain in Supply Chain, Real Estate, Academia, Health, Food Security and Government. I was involved in using blockchain to digitize land sale and purchase transactions in the Ministry of Lands in Kenya.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Development and implemented Anonymous Tax Evation surveillance System for Government of Kenya.

projects.title: My Personal Portfolio
projects.category: A React based resume website template

testimonials.text: I worked with Paul Miningwa during he implementation of Integrated Board Management System. He is an excellent team player and problem solver. I highly recommend him for your projects.

Paul Miningwa was my team leader during the development of Land Digital Register. He is a good leader and manager who is helpful in assisting you to set and reach your targets. He also delivers excellent mentorship and holding his team members accountable on their performance.
